attributes.action: Stop the charge to halton residents having to cross the two bridges in Halton
attributes.additional_details:
The mess that widnes and runcorn residents have had to put up with and extra fuel costs due to diversions in building the Mersey gateway bridge, we feel like we have already paid.
The tolls across the board are to expensive and will close Halton down as residents and businesses will not be able to afford it. The tolls need revising to look at reasonale charges for all
attributes.background:
Halton resident were told bridge crossing would be free
We are now to pay a £10 annual charge to register, and after this only get 25 free one way trips then we pay with a 10% discount.
The toll charges are to expensive a one way trip will cost £2

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Halton Borough Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
